metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8719 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The dissect_dns_answer function in epan/dissectors/packet-dns.c in the DNSdissector in Wireshark 1.12.x before 1.12.9 mishandles the EDNS0 ClientSubnet option, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(application crash) via a crafted packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8719` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwireshark11 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwiretap8 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwscodecs2 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
libwsutil9 - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
tshark - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-common - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-gtk - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
wireshark-qt - 2.0.2+ga16e22e-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wireshark package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.2+ga16e22e-1').
